Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • Date
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateTime

    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a date(Gregorian Date) with day, month, and year attribute.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int day  
      protected int month  
      protected int year  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Date​(int year, int month, int day)
      Constructs a date with the specified year, month, and day.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
      Checks if the current date is equal(according the terms) to the object provided.
      int hashCode​()
      Generates a hash code for the current date object, that represents it.
      void setMonth​(int month)
      Sets the month attribute of the date to the specified value.
      java.lang.String toString​()
      Returns a string representation of the date in the required format "DD/MM/YYYY".

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • day

        protected int day

      • month

        protected int month

      • year

        protected int year

    • Constructor Detail

      • Date

        public Date​(int year,
            int month,
            int day)
        Constructs a date with the specified year, month, and day. If the provided values are invalid, default values are used (1/1/0).
        Parameters:
        year - The year attribute of the date.
        month - The month attribute of the date.
        day - The day attribute of the date.

    • Method Detail

      • setMonth

        public void setMonth​(int month)
        Sets the month attribute of the date to the specified value. If it is a valid month value (between 1 and 12).
        Parameters:
        month - The given month value

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
        Checks if the current date is equal(according the terms) to the object provided. Two dates objects are considered equal if all fields are equal(their day, month, and year fields).
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        other - The object we compare to
        Returns:
        'true' if the dates are equal, else - 'false'

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode​()
        Generates a hash code for the current date object, that represents it. The hash code is calculated using the day, month, and year attributes. We use multiplication and addition operations to combine the hash codes, for producing a distribution of hash values.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The hash code value of the current date object.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Returns a string representation of the date in the required format "DD/MM/YYYY".
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The string representation of the date
